content: it s finally done i ve been wanting to make a toque or beanie with my favourite owl motif for a while now i finally got around to it and i have to say it turned out better than i thought but to the pattern itself like all my work you can read this for free on my website ** how to knit a beanie hat with owls free knitting pattern 1 ** the pattern uses worsted weight yarn and size 5 mm size 8 us single pointed knitting needles and a cable needle if you don t know how to do cable stitches i ve added scannable qr codes and links to videos to help you along this knitting pattern is knit flat making it very easy to make i indicate where to change the colours of yarn in the pattern so there isn t any confusion but please note you can knit the beanie in one solid colour also there s no reason why you can t this tuque is in adult sizes only this hat also has matching owl motif gloves though that pattern is not included with this pattern if you would like to knit a pair of the matching gloves you can find that pattern here ** knit flat owl fingerless gloves 2 ** and now the scarf is done you can read the ad supported version on my website here ** how to knit a scarf with owls free knitting pattern 3 ** like all my patterns you have my permission to buy give away or keep any of the physical items you make you are not permitted to redistribute or copy this pattern in any way not an additional copy for your sister mom uncle friend whatever the copy you buy is for your use only please respect the hard work i put in to designing formatting and publishing my work 1 https //kweenbee com/how-to-knit-a-beanie-hat-with-owls-free-knitting-pattern/ 2 https //kweenbee com/easy-to-knit-owl-fingerless-gloves-free-knitting-pattern/ 3 https //kweenbee com/how-to-knit-a-scarf-with-owls-free-knitting-pattern/
